thread.title: Taylor, Ricci & Associates Hiring Several more Case Managers
thread.title_full: Taylor, Ricci & Associates Hiring Several more Case Managers

author: prbuzz.com
title: Taylor, Ricci & Associates Hiring Several more Case Managers
text:
Taylor, Ricci & Associates, the Nation’s leading debt collection agency has announced today that they will be hiring new Case Managers to handle the huge spike in new clients they have received as a result of their successful marketing campaign.
Already growing past anticipated numbers, Taylor, Ricci & Associates has experienced tremendous growth this last quarter. This growth can be attributed to aggressive marketing and client retention efforts the Company said. “It is our goal to not only gain new clients” said a top executive, but to “focus our efforts on retaining our current clients, provide them an excellent experience and have them return again.”
This tactic is definitely working. With an already large workforce, Taylor, Ricci will now add even more Case Managers to assist their clients through their debt collection process.
To see why Taylor, Ricci is so successful, visit www.tra-onyourside.com for more information.
Taylor, Ricci & Associates
20555 Devonshire St., 488
Chatsworth, CA 91311
